text: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِجۡسًا إِلَىٰ رِجۡسِهِمۡ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

translation.en: But as for those in whose hearts is disease, it has [only] increased them in evil [in addition] to their evil. And they will have died while they are disbelievers
translation.id: (Dan adapun orang-orang yang di dalam hatinya ada penyakit,383) maka (dengan surah itu) akan menambah kekafiran mereka yang telah ada dan mereka akan mati dalam keadaan kafir
